name: Patient Relationship
description: This module defines the Attributes that reference SOP Instances related to this SOP Class.

name: Patient Identification
description: This module defines the Attributes relevant to identifying a Patient.

name: Patient Demographic
description: This module defines the Attributes relevant to generally describing a Patient at a specific point in time, e.g., at the time of admission.

name: Patient Medical
description: This module defines the Attributes relevant to a Patient's medical state or history.

name: Visit Relationship
description: This module defines the Attributes that reference SOP Instances related to this SOP Class.

name: Visit Identification
description: This module defines the Attributes relevant to identifying a Visit.

name: Visit Status
description: This module defines the Attributes relevant to the Patient's stay with the healthcare provider.

name: Visit Admission
description: This module defines the Attributes relevant to admitting a Patient during a Visit.

name: Scheduled Procedure Step
description: Table C.4-10. Scheduled Procedure Step Module Attributes

name: Requested Procedure
description: Table C.4-11. Requested Procedure Module Attributes

name: Imaging Service Request
description: Table C.4-12. Imaging Service Request Module Attributes

name: Performed Procedure Step Relationship
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to reference other SOP Classes and other Information Entities of the DICOM real-world model as defined in Section 7.3.1.6.

name: Performed Procedure Step Information
description: This module defines the general Attributes that may be used by all specific Procedure Steps.

name: Image Acquisition Results
description: This module specifies Attributes that describe the acquisition of images during the performance of the Procedure Step and that provide references to the Series, Images and other Composite SOP Instances associated with this Modality Performed Procedure Step.

name: Billing and Material Management Code
description: The Attributes defined in This module provide a means to transmit billing and material management codes from a modality to an Information System. It is beyond the scope of this Standard to define all the required coding schemes and the relevant codes.

name: Instance Availability Notification
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to describe which Instances are available and their relationships.

name: Patient
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Patient that describe and identify the Patient who is the subject of a Study. This Module contains Attributes of the Patient that are needed for interpretation of the Composite Instances and are common for all Studies performed on the Patient. It contains Attributes that are also included in the Patient Modules in Section C.2.

name: Clinical Trial Subject
description: This module contains Attributes that identify a Patient as a clinical trial or research Subject.

name: General Study
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify the Study performed upon the Patient.

name: Patient Study
description: This module defines Attributes that provide information about the Patient at the time the Study started.

name: Clinical Trial Study
description: This module contains Attributes that identify a Study in the context of a clinical trial or research.

name: General Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Series within a Study.

name: Clinical Trial Series
description: This module contains Attributes that identify a Series in the context of a clinical trial or research.

name: Enhanced Series
description: This module Table specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Series within a Study.

name: Frame of Reference
description: This module specifies the Attributes necessary to uniquely identify a Frame of Reference that ensures the spatial relationship of Images within a Series. It also allows Images across multiple Series to share the same Frame Of Reference. This Frame Of Reference (or coordinate system) shall be constant for all Images related to a specific Frame Of Reference.

name: Synchronization
description: This module specifies the Attributes necessary to uniquely identify a Frame of Reference that establishes the temporal relationship of SOP Instances. A synchronized environment may be established based on a shared time of day clock, and/or on a shared trigger event or synchronization waveform channel.

name: General Equipment
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe the piece of equipment that produced a Series of Composite Instances.

name: Enhanced General Equipment
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe the piece of equipment that produced a Series of Composite Instances.

name: General Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe an image within a particular Series.

name: Image Plane
description: This module specifies the Attributes that define the transmitted pixel array of a two dimensional image plane.

name: Image Pixel
description: This module describes the Image Pixel Module.

name: Contrast/Bolus
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the contrast /bolus used in the acquisition of the Image.

name: Enhanced Contrast/Bolus
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the contrast/bolus used in the acquisition of the Image.

name: Cine
description: This module specifies the Attributes of a Multi-frame Cine Image.

name: Multi-frame
description: This module specifies the Attributes of a Multi-frame pixel data Image.

name: Frame Pointers
description: This module specifies the Attributes of a Frame Pointer Module.

name: Mask
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe mask operations for a Multi-frame image.

name: Display Shutter
description: The Display shutter is a geometric mask consisting of one or more combined shapes that may be applied on the image for presentation purposes in order to neutralize the display of any of the pixels located outside of the shutter shape. Geometry of the shutter is specified with respect to a row and column coordinate system where the origin is the upper left hand pixel. This origin is specified by the values 1,1 for row/column. A row coordinate represents a row spacing (vertical) and a column coordinate represents a column spacing (horizontal). Up to three different shutter shapes may be used and superimposed.

name: Device
description: This module describes the Attributes of devices or calibration objects (e.g., catheters, markers, baskets) that are associated with a Study and/or image.

name: Intervention
description: This module describes the Attributes of therapies (e.g., interventions during an angiographic procedure) that are associated with a Study and/or image.

name: Acquisition Context
description: This module specifies Attributes for description of the conditions present during data acquisition.

name: Bitmap Display Shutter
description: The Bitmap Display Shutter is a bitmap that defines an arbitrary shape that may be applied on the image for presentation purposes in order to neutralize the display of any of the pixels defined in the bitmap.

name: Multi-frame Functional Groups
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Multi-frame Functional Groups Module. This Module is included in SOP Instances even if there is only one frame in the Instance.

name: Multi-frame Dimension
description: The This module contains a Sequence with Items pointing to Attributes defining a set of dimensions that are usually known prior to the acquisition commencing. It is up to the generating applications to decide what Attributes are important to describe the multi-frame dimensions.

name: Cardiac Synchronization
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Cardiac Synchronization Module.

name: Respiratory Synchronization
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Respiratory Synchronization Module.

name: Bulk Motion Synchronization
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Bulk Motion Synchronization Module.

name: Supplemental Palette Color Lookup Table
description: This Module is used in conjunction with Multi-frame IODs that use RGB color in a number of frames. The value of Pixel Presentation (0008,9205) for such frames equals COLOR.

name: Patient Orientation
description: This section describes Attributes of the Patient Orientation Module by describing the patient orientation related to gravity and equipment. This module contains IOD Attributes that describe the Patient Orientation.

name: Image - Equipment Coordinate Relationship
description: This section describes the Image - Equipment Coordinate Relationship Module. This module contains the Attributes that specify how the equipment (e.g., gantry) and patient oriented coordinate system (in conjunction with Image Position (Patient) (0020,0032) and Image Orientation (Patient) (0020,0037) Attributes) are related.

name: Specimen
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify one or more Specimens being imaged.

name: Enhanced Palette Color Lookup Table
description: This module specifies the Attributes that define data flow through the Enhanced Blending and Display Pipeline. See Section C.7.6.23.1 for an overview of the Enhanced Blending and Display Pipeline.

name: Floating Point Image Pixel
description: This module describes the Floating Point Image Pixel Module. This Module differs from the Section C.7.6.3 Image Pixel Module in that:

name: Double Floating Point Image Pixel
description: This module describes the Double Floating Point Image Pixel Module. This Module differs from the Section C.7.6.3 Image Pixel Module in that:

name: Real-Time Bulk Data Flow
description: This module references pixels/waveforms that are not contained within the DICOM dataset but conveyed in the associated Flows, as described in Section 6.1 in PS3.22 .

name: Current Frame Functional Groups
description: This module defines the Attributes related to the current frame when the IOD is transported using Real-Time Communication. It corresponds to the "per-frame" Attribute for the non-Real-Time IODs.

name: Real-Time Acquisition
description: This module defines the Attributes related to all frames when the IOD is transported using Real-Time Communication.

name: Palette Color Lookup Table
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Lookup table data for images with Palette Color photometric interpretation.

name: CR Series
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a computed radiography Series performed on the patient.

name: CR Image
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe computed radiography images.

name: CT Image
description: The table in this Section contains IOD Attributes that describe CT images.

name: Multi-energy CT Image
description: The table in this Section contains IOD Attributes that describe a Multi-energy CT image.

name: MR Image
description: This module contains the Attributes that describe MR images.

name: NM/PET Patient Orientation
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the NM/PET Patient Orientation.

name: NM Image Pixel
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the pixel data of a NM image.

name: NM Multi-frame
description: This module specifies the Attributes of a NM Multi-frame Image. This Module is always included in a NM SOP Instance, even if there is only one frame in the image.

name: NM Image
description: This module contains the Attributes that describe Nuclear Medicine Images.

name: NM Isotope
description: This module contains Attributes that describe the isotope administered for the acquisition.

name: NM Detector
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe Nuclear Medicine Detectors used to produce an image.

name: NM Tomo Acquisition
description: This Module applies to a TOMO Multi-frame Image. This Module is present when Image Type (0008,0008) Value 3, is equal to TOMO, GATED TOMO, RECON TOMO, or RECON GATED TOMO. The elements found in this Module describe the acquisition of the Image.

name: NM Multi-Gated Acquisition
description: This module contains Attributes that describe a multi-gated acquisition image performed on the patient. This refers to frames acquired while the patient is connected to a gating device.

name: NM Phase
description: This module contains Attributes that describe dynamic phases of a dynamic acquisition image performed on the patient. This Module is present only when Image Type (0008,0008), Value 3, is equal to DYNAMIC. A phase is defined as a collection of frames in which the acquisition time per frame and the time delay between frames remains constant. A new phase shall be defined whenever there is a change in the time between frames, the acquisition time per frame, or the position of the patient relative to the detector.

name: NM Reconstruction
description: This module contains Attributes that describe Nuclear Medicine reconstructed volumes. Reconstructed volumes are created by applying a transformation (reconstruction) process to the acquired TOMO frames. This Module is present only when Image Type (0008,0008) Value 3 is equal to RECON TOMO or RECON GATED TOMO.

name: US Region Calibration
description: The US Region Calibration Module has been introduced into the ultrasound IOD to provide access to the full range of data that may be present in a single US image. US images often contain multiple regions that have independent data regions, e.g., quad screen loops that may have different calibration information. The data presented in the various regions of a US image can represent a multiplicity of physical parameters, e.g., spatial distance, blood velocity, time, volume, etc., and these are often contained in the value of the pixel itself. It is therefore imperative that physical information be available for the various regions of a single region independent of each other.

name: US Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe ultrasound images.

name: SC Equipment
description: This Module describes equipment used to convert images into a DICOM format.

name: SC Image
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe Secondary Capture Images.

name: SC Multi-frame Image
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe SC Multi-frame images.

name: SC Multi-frame Vector
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that may be the target of the Frame Increment Pointer (0028,0009) for SC Multi-frame images.

name: X-Ray Image
description: Table C.8-26. X-Ray Image Module Attributes

name: X-Ray Acquisition
description: Table C.8-27. X-Ray Acquisition Module Attributes

name: X-Ray Collimator
description: An X-Ray Collimator is a device placed close to the X-Ray Source to restrict the span of the X-Ray beam. It is often made of lead shutters. This module presents in a graphical form its relationship with the Field Of View Dimensions (0018,1149).

name: X-Ray Table
description: This module contains Attributes that describe X-Ray images acquired with movement of the patient imaging table.

name: XA Positioner
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a c-arm positioner typically used in acquiring X-Ray Angiographic Images. The coordinate system used to track the positioner is defined in reference to the patient. The definition of coordinates with respect to the equipment is not supported. Furthermore, this Module does not describe the movement of the patient.

name: XRF Positioner
description: Table C.8-31. XRF Positioner Module Attributes

name: X-Ray Tomography Acquisition
description: This Module describes the Attributes of a Tomography acquisition (translation of X-Ray source during the acquisition of a single-frame image).

name: X-Ray Acquisition Dose
description: This Module describes the Attributes related to dose delivery from an X-Ray source during the acquisition of an X-Ray image.

name: X-Ray Generation
description: This Module describes the Attributes related to generation of X-Rays during the acquisition of an X-Ray image.

name: X-Ray Filtration
description: This Module describes the Attributes related to the filtration of X-Rays during the acquisition of an X-Ray image.

name: X-Ray Grid
description: This Module describes the Attributes related to the use of a grid to reduce scatter of X-Rays during the acquisition of an X-Ray image.

name: RT Series
description: There exist significant differences in the manner in which RT objects as compared to diagnostic objects. An RT object can be one of several types, and a series of a given object type may be created over a temporal span of several weeks. The This module has been created to satisfy the requirements of the standard DICOM Query/Retrieve model while including only those Attributes relevant to the identification and selection of radiotherapy objects.

name: RT Image
description: This module contains Attributes that describe RT-specific characteristics of a projection image. The image described by these Attributes must be a radiotherapy image acquired or calculated using a conical imaging geometry.

name: RT Dose
description: The This module is used to convey 2D or 3D radiation dose data generated from treatment planning systems or similar devices. The Attributes defined within the Module support dose for a single radiation beam (potentially comprised of multiple segments, as delivered in a dynamic treatment) or a group of beams comprising either a fraction group (see Section C.8.8.13) or a complete treatment plan (potentially the sum of multiple fraction groups).

name: RT DVH
description: The This module provides for the inclusion of differential or cumulative dose volume histogram data. The data contained within this Module may supplement dose data in the RT Dose Module and/or RT Dose ROI Module, or it may be present in the absence of other dose data.

name: Structure Set
description: A structure set defines a set of areas of significance. Each area can be associated with a Frame of Reference and zero or more images. Information that can be transferred with each region of interest (ROI) includes geometrical and display parameters, and generation technique.

name: ROI Contour
description: In general, a ROI can be defined by either a sequence of overlays or a sequence of contours. This Module, if present, is used to define the ROI as a set of contours. Each ROI contains a sequence of one or more contours, where a contour is either a single point (for a point ROI) or more than one point (representing an open or closed polygon).

name: RT Dose ROI
description: RT Dose ROI provides ancillary dose-related information to the ROI data defined within the This module and ROI Contour Module, which may be included in the RT Dose IOD composite object. These Modules in combination provide for the definition of dose data in the form of isodose curves or named or unnamed dose points. Isodose curves in radiation oncology are simply contours identifying a set of points with the same dose value.

name: RT ROI Observations
description: The RT ROI Observations Module specifies the identification and interpretation of an ROI specified in the This module and ROI Contour Module.

name: RT General Plan
description: Table C.8-45. RT General Plan Module Attributes

name: RT Prescription
description: Table C.8-46. RT Prescription Module Attributes

name: RT Tolerance Tables
description: Table C.8-47. RT Tolerance Tables Module Attributes

name: RT Patient Setup
description: The This module contains information describing the positioning of the patient with respect to the treatment machine, along with any fixation devices used. It also describes the shielding devices applied to the patient. The Module contains a Sequence of patient setup descriptions, each of which may be referenced by one of more beams or brachy application setups.

name: RT Fraction Scheme
description: The This module contains Attributes that describe a single or multiple scheme of dose descriptions. Each Sequence Item contains dose specification information, fractionation patterns, and either beam or brachytherapy application setup specifications. The design of the RT Fraction Scheme Module allows a beam or brachytherapy application setup to be used in multiple fraction schemes.

name: RT Beams
description: The This module contains information defining equipment parameters for delivery of external radiation beams.

name: RT Brachy Application Setups
description: The This module describes the application of a brachytherapy radiotherapy treatment. It contains one or more sources, each associated with one or more Channels. A Channel is a device by which a source is placed in its intended treatment position or positions. A Channel may consist of a Source Applicator plus a Transfer Tube, a Source Applicator alone, a rigid or flexible linear source, or a seed. A number of Channels (for example applicators, sources or seeds) are generally arranged in an Application Setup, which may be considered a "logical" device. It is important not to confuse Application Setup with Applicator. The model used here has been primarily built around the concept of remote afterloading, but extended to support other brachytherapy applications such as manual applicators and molds, seeds, and sources. Additional devices that are not Channels are described as Brachy Accessory Devices. Examples of Accessory Devices include shields that modify the dose distribution from all sources in the treatment. However, Channel shields modify the dose only for the source(s) in that Channel.

name: Approval
description: Table C.8-52. Approval Module Attributes

name: RT General Treatment Record
description: Table C.8-53. RT General Treatment Record Module Attributes

name: RT Treatment Machine Record
description: Table C.8-54. RT Treatment Machine Record Module Attributes

name: Measured Dose Reference Record
description: Table C.8-55. Measured Dose Reference Record Module Attributes

name: Calculated Dose Reference Record
description: Table C.8-56. Calculated Dose Reference Record Module Attributes

name: RT Beams Session Record
description: Table C.8-57. RT Beams Session Record Module Attributes

name: RT Brachy Session Record
description: Table C.8-58. RT Brachy Session Record Module Attributes

name: RT Treatment Summary Record
description: Table C.8-59. RT Treatment Summary Record Module Attributes

name: RT Ion Tolerance Tables
description: The RT Ion Tolerance Tables Module contains information describing the maximum allowed differences between the planned and measured Attributes for Ion therapy.

name: RT Ion Beams
description: The RT Ion Beams Module contains information defining equipment parameters for delivery of external Ion radiation beams.

name: RT Ion Beams Session Record
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the measured and recorded settings acquired during Ion Radiation Treatments.

name: RT Beams Delivery Instruction
description: The RT Beams Delivery Instruction Module contains additional information required by a Treatment Delivery System (TDS) when specifying delivery of an external beam radiotherapy treatment. This information is supplied by a Treatment Management System (TMS) when it creates an RT Beams Delivery Instruction SOP Instance, a composite SOP Instance in turn referenced by a Unified Procedure Step (UPS) in the Unified Procedure Step model.

name: RT Brachy Application Setup Delivery Instruction
description: The RT Brachy Application Setup Delivery Instruction Module contains additional information required by a Treatment Delivery System (TDS) when specifying delivery of a brachytherapy treatment.

name: PET Series
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a PET Series.

name: PET Isotope
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a PET Isotope.

name: PET Multi-Gated Acquisition
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a PET Multi-gated Acquisition.

name: PET Image
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe PET images.

name: DX Series
description: The Digital X-Ray IODs use the General Series Module described in This module , specialized by the DX Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of projection Digital X-Ray.

name: DX Anatomy Imaged
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe the anatomy contained in a DX IOD.

name: DX Image
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a DX Image by specializing Attributes of the General Image Module and Image Pixel Module, and adding additional Attributes.

name: DX Detector
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a DX detector.

name: DX Positioning
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe the positioning used in acquiring Digital X-Ray Images.

name: Mammography Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about a Digital Mammography Series.

name: Mammography Image
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a Digital Mammography X-Ray Image including its acquisition and positioning.

name: Intra-Oral Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about a Digital Intra-Oral X-Ray Series.

name: Intra-Oral Image
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a Digital Intra-Oral X-Ray Image including its acquisition and positioning.

name: Enhanced Mammography Series
description: The Breast Tomosynthesis Image IOD uses the This module , specialized by the Enhanced Mammography Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of a Breast Tomosynthesis device.

name: VL Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe a VL Image produced by Endoscopy (ES), General Microscopy (GM), Automated-Stage Microscopy (SM), External-camera Photography (XC), or other VL imaging Modalities.

name: Slide Coordinates
description: The table in this Section contains Attributes that describe Slide Coordinates. Slide Coordinates provide a means to locate an image within a given Frame of Reference.

name: Whole Slide Microscopy Series
description: This module specifies Attributes for the Whole Slide Microscopy Series Module, including specialization of Attributes in the General Series Module for use in the Whole Slide Microscopy Series Module.

name: Whole Slide Microscopy Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Whole Slide Microscopy Image Module.

name: Optical Path
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the optical paths used in the VL imaging. Each optical path is a combination of illumination, filters, lenses, and sensors, and each combination is identified for possible reference by Attributes in other Modules. Additional optical path parameters may be specified in the Acquisition Context Module.

name: Multi-Resolution Navigation
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Multi-Resolution Navigation Module, used in Whole Slide Microscopy LOCALIZER images.

name: Slide Label
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the interpretation of a scanned Slide Label.

name: VL Photographic Equipment
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe a photographic device such as a camera.

name: VL Photographic Acquisition
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the process of acquisition of a photographic image.

name: VL Photographic Geolocation
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the geographic location during acquisition of a photographic image.

name: Enhanced MR Image
description: This section describes the Enhanced MR Image Module.

name: MR Pulse Sequence
description: The primary purpose of this Module is to identify the pulse sequence and variations on that, which was used in creation of the image. Terminology is intended to be neutral, and allow equivalent sequences provided by different vendors to be classified the same.

name: MR Series
description: The MR IODs use the This module , specialized by the MR Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of MR device.

name: MR Spectroscopy
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the MR Spectroscopy Module.

name: MR Spectroscopy Pulse Sequence
description: The primary purpose of this Module is to identify the pulse sequence and variations that were used in creation of the spectroscopic data. Terminology is intended to be neutral, and allow equivalent pulse sequences provided by different vendors to be classified together.

name: MR Spectroscopy Data
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Spectroscopy Data.

name: CT Series
description: The CT IODs use the This module , specialized by the CT Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of CT device.

name: Enhanced CT Image
description: This section describes the This module . Table C.8-114 specifies the Attributes of the Enhanced CT Image Module.

name: Enhanced Multi-energy CT Acquisition
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Multi-energy CT Acquisition technique in the Enhanced CT Image.

name: Ophthalmic Photography Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe an Ophthalmic Photography Series.

name: Ophthalmic Photography Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe an Ophthalmic Photography Image produced by Ophthalmic Photography equipment (OP) imaging Modalities.

name: Ophthalmic Photographic Parameters
description: This Module describes equipment used to create original images.

name: Ophthalmic Photography Acquisition Parameters
description: This Module describes patient clinical conditions related to the image acquisition.

name: Ocular Region Imaged
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe the anatomy imaged in an Ophthalmic Photography or Ophthalmic Tomography Image Storage SOP Instance.

name: Ophthalmic Tomography Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Ophthalmic Tomography Series.

name: Ophthalmic Tomography Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe an Image produced by Ophthalmic Tomography imaging modalities.

name: Ophthalmic Tomography Acquisition Parameters
description: This module describes patient clinical conditions related to an Ophthalmic Tomography image acquisition.

name: Ophthalmic Tomography Parameters
description: This module describes the parameters and characteristics of the acquisition device related to an Ophthalmic Tomography image acquisition.

name: Wide Field Ophthalmic Photography Stereographic Projection
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Wide Field Photography Stereographic Projection Module.

name: Wide Field Ophthalmic Photography 3D Coordinates
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Wide Field Ophthalmic Photography 3D Coordinates Module.

name: Wide Field Ophthalmic Photography Quality Rating
description: This module specifies the Attributes that evaluate the quality of the projection or mapping used for a wide field ophthalmic photography image.

name: Ophthalmic Optical Coherence Tomography En Face Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Ophthalmic Optical Coherence Tomography En Face Image Module.

name: Ophthalmic Optical Coherence Tomography En Face Image Quality Rating
description: This module specifies the Attributes for evaluating the quality of the derived en face image.

name: Ophthalmic Optical Coherence Tomography B-scan Volume Analysis Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Ophthalmic Optical Coherence Tomography B-scan Volume Analysis Image Module.

name: Ophthalmic Tomography En Face Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Ophthalmic Tomography En Face Series.

name: Ophthalmic Tomography B-scan Volume Analysis Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Ophthalmic Tomography B-scan Volume Analysis Series.

name: Stereometric Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe a Stereometric Series produced by Ophthalmic Photography equipment (OP) imaging Modalities.

name: Stereometric Relationship
description: The stereometric relationship Module is used to identify pairs of images that may be viewed in stereo. It is possible that the same image or frame may be a member of multiple pairs. The images forming a pair shall be in different SOP Instances. The images forming a pair can be in different Series. All Instances referenced in this Module shall be in the same Study as the Instance in which the Module occurs.

name: XA/XRF Series
description: The XA/XRF X-Ray IODs use the This module , specialized by the XA/XRF Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity specified in Section A.47 and Section A.48. It is defining what constitutes a Series for the context of projection XA/XRF device.

name: Enhanced XA/XRF Image
description: This section describes the Enhanced XA/XRF Image Module. This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a XA/XRF Image by specializing Attributes of the General Image Module and Image Pixel Module, and adding additional Attributes.

name: XA/XRF Acquisition
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the XA/XRF Acquisition Module.

name: X-Ray Image Intensifier
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Image Intensifier Module.

name: X-Ray Detector
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe an X-Ray detector.

name: XA/XRF Multi-frame Presentation
description: This module specifies the Attributes of a XA/XRF Multi-frame Presentation Module.

name: Segmentation Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Segmentation Series Module.

name: Segmentation Image
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Segmentation Image Module.

name: X-Ray 3D Image
description: This section describes the X-Ray 3D Image Module. This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a X-Ray 3D Image by specializing Attributes of the General Image Module and Image Pixel Module, and adding additional Attributes.

name: X-Ray 3D Angiographic Image Contributing Sources
description: This section describes the X-Ray 3D Angiographic Image Contributing Sources Module. The Attributes in this Module specify the overall characteristics of one or more sources that were used to create a X-Ray 3D Angiographic Image SOP Instance. This module contains the relevant IOD Attributes that describe X-Ray 3D Angiographic Image Contributing Sources.

name: X-Ray 3D Craniofacial Image Contributing Sources
description: This section describes the X-Ray 3D Craniofacial Image Contributing Sources Module. The Attributes in this Module specify the overall characteristics of one or more sources that were used to create a X-Ray 3D Craniofacial Image SOP Instance. This module contains the relevant IOD Attributes that describe X-Ray 3D Craniofacial Image Contributing Sources.

name: Breast Tomosynthesis Contributing Sources
description: This section describes the Breast Tomosynthesis Contributing Sources Module. The Attributes in this Module specify the overall characteristics of one or more source images that were used to create a Breast Tomosynthesis Image SOP Instance. This module contains the IOD Attributes that describe Breast Tomosynthesis Contributing Sources.

name: X-Ray 3D Angiographic Acquisition
description: This section describes the X-Ray 3D Angiographic Acquisition Module.

name: X-Ray 3D Craniofacial Acquisition
description: This section describes the X-Ray 3D Craniofacial Acquisition Module.

name: Breast Tomosynthesis Acquisition
description: This section describes the Breast Tomosynthesis Acquisition Module.

name: X-Ray 3D Reconstruction
description: This section describes the X-Ray 3D Reconstruction Module. This module contains IOD Attributes that describe the reconstructions used to create this SOP Instance. A single SOP Instance may contain the result of one or more reconstructions (e.g., a set of volumes). Each Item in the X-Ray 3D Reconstruction Sequence specifies the characteristics of such a result.

name: Breast View
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe the view of a digital breast tomosynthesis image.

name: Enhanced PET Series
description: The Enhanced PET IODs use the This module , specialized by the Enhanced PET Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of PET device.

name: Enhanced PET Acquisition
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe PET Acquisitions.

name: Enhanced PET Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Enhanced PET Image Module.

name: Enhanced PET Isotope
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe a PET Isotope.

name: Enhanced PET Corrections
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Enhanced PET Corrections Module.

name: Surface Segmentation
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Surface Segmentation Module.

name: Enhanced US Series
description: This module specifies Attributes for the Enhanced US Series Module, including specialization of Attributes in the General Series Module for use in the Enhanced US Series Module.

name: Ultrasound Frame of Reference
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Ultrasound Frame Of Reference Module. See Section C.8.24.2.1.

name: Enhanced US Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Enhanced US Image Module. As described in Section A.1.2.6, the Attributes in this Module apply to the first frame of a multi-frame image; any or all of this information may be overridden by Attributes in Per-frame Functional Groups.

name: IVUS Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes of an IVUS Module.

name: Excluded Intervals
description: The Excluded Intervals Module indicates those periods within Acquisition Duration (0018,9073) during which no volume acquisition takes place. It provides information not available at the frame level or image level, since individual frames of the volume may have been built-up over a time period within which some intervals were excluded from acquisition. Further, it provides information that is not specific to associated waveform objects since the fact that volume acquisition was excluded during these intervals is a characteristic of the volume, not the associated waveform(s), see This module . Table C.8.24.5-1 specifies the Attributes of the Excluded Intervals Module.

name: Lensometry Measurements Series
description: The Lensometry Measurements IODs use the This module , specialized by the Lensometry Measurements Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of Ophthalmic device.

name: Autorefraction Measurements Series
description: The Autorefraction Measurements IODs use the This module , specialized by the Autorefraction Measurements Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of Ophthalmic device.

name: Keratometry Measurements Series
description: The Keratometry Measurements IODs use the This module , specialized by the Keratometry Measurements Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of Ophthalmic device.

name: Subjective Refraction Measurements Series
description: The Subjective Refraction Measurements IODs use the This module , specialized by the Subjective Refraction Measurements Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of Ophthalmic device.

name: Visual Acuity Measurements Series
description: The Visual Acuity Measurements IODs use the This module , specialized by the Visual Acuity Measurements Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of Ophthalmic device.

name: General Ophthalmic Refractive Measurements
description: This module defines the General Ophthalmic Refractive Measurements Module Attributes.

name: Lensometry Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to capture the refractive measurements by a lensometer for spectacles. This is typically for a pair of lenses, but sometimes for just one. Sometimes a single lens is measured with an unknown laterality.

name: Autorefraction Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the refractive measurements by an autorefractor of a patient's eyes. Usually both eyes are measured, but sometimes just one.

name: Keratometry Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the keratometric measurements by a keratometer of a patient's eyes. Usually both eyes are measured, but sometimes just one.

name: Subjective Refraction Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the subjective refractive measurements of a patient's eyes. Usually both eyes are measured, but sometimes just one.

name: Visual Acuity Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the subjective measurements of a patient's visual acuity. Usually each eye is measured individually, but sometimes only one eye is measured; sometimes the visual acuity of both eyes working together is measured. The visual acuity may be measured uncorrected, or with various refractive corrections, such as best corrected distance, pinhole, habitual near, etc

name: Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Series.

name: Ophthalmic Axial Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to encode axial measurements of the eye made by an axial measurements device. This is typically done for both eyes, but may be for just one.

name: Intraocular Lens Calculations Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Intraocular Lens Calculations Series.

name: Intraocular Lens Calculations
description: This module defines the Attributes used to calculate the power of an intraocular lens to be placed in a patient's eye. This is typically done for both eyes for comparison, but may be for just one eye. Values used may be measurements acquired using the axial length measurements device, manually entered, or derived from a referenced SOP class or other data source.

name: Visual Field Static Perimetry Measurements Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Visual Field Static Perimetry Measurements Series.

name: Visual Field Static Perimetry Test Parameters
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the parameters used during a patient's visual field test.

name: Visual Field Static Perimetry Test Reliability
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the test reliability parameters determined during a patient's visual field test.

name: Visual Field Static Perimetry Test Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the test measurement values determined during a patient's visual field test.

name: Visual Field Static Perimetry Test Results
description: This module defines the Attributes used to interpret the test results of a patient's visual field test.

name: Ophthalmic Patient Clinical Information and Test Lens Parameters
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent a patient's clinical parameters during an ophthalmic test.

name: Intravascular OCT Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Intravascular Optical Coherence Tomography Series.

name: Intravascular OCT Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe an Image produced by Intravascular OCT imaging modalities.

name: Intravascular OCT Acquisition Parameters
description: This module describes the parameters used to acquire an Intravascular Optical Coherence Tomography image.

name: Intravascular OCT Processing Parameters
description: This module describes the parameters used for processing an Intravascular Optical Coherence Tomography polar data image.

name: Intravascular Image Acquisition Parameters
description: This module describes the parameters and characteristics of an intravascular image acquisition. These parameters are common to both IVUS and IVOCT.

name: Ophthalmic Thickness Map Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Ophthalmic Thickness Map Series.

name: Ophthalmic Thickness Map
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe an Image produced by ophthalmic thickness mapping devices.

name: Ophthalmic Thickness Map Quality Rating
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the quality rating for the ophthalmic mapping.

name: Optical Surface Scanner Series
description: This module contains IOD Attributes that describe an optical surface scan Series performed on the patient.

name: Scan Procedure
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Scan Procedure Module.

name: Corneal Topography Map Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Corneal Topography Map Series.

name: Corneal Topography Map Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe an Image produced by corneal topography mapping devices.

name: Corneal Topography Map Analysis
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the corneal Topography map analysis.

name: Enhanced Mammography Image
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about the Enhanced Mammography Image Module.

name: Parametric Map Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Parametric Map Series Module.

name: Parametric Map Image
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Parametric Map Image Module.

name: Tractography Results Series
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information about a Tractography Results Series.

name: Tractography Results
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the tracks and measurements in the tractography results.

name: Overlay Plane
description: This module contains Attributes that describe characteristics of an Overlay Plane.

name: Multi-frame Overlay
description: This module specifies the Attributes of a Multi-frame overlay.

name: Displayed Area
description: This Module describes Attributes required to define a Specified Displayed Area space.

name: Graphic Annotation
description: This Module defines Attributes of vector graphics and text annotation that shall be made available by a display device to be applied to an image. The graphics and text are defined in position and size relative to the image pixel coordinates or the Specified Displayed Area space (defined in This module ); in the context of a Volumetric Presentation State IOD, the annotation is relative to the Volumetric Presentation View (e.g., the MPR view defined in Section C.11.26). A Graphic Annotation shall be related to an Image.

name: Spatial Transformation
description: This Module defines a manner of rotating an image by increments of ninety degrees and flipping an image.

name: Graphic Layer
description: This Module defines the characteristics of the layers in which overlays, graphic and text may be rendered.

name: Waveform Identification
description: The table in this section contains Attributes that identify a Waveform as a separate information entity.

name: Waveform
description: The table in this section contains Attributes that describe a time-based waveform. A waveform consists of one or more multiplex groups, each encoded into an Item in the Waveform Sequence. All channels within a multiplex group are synchronously digitized at a common sampling frequency.

name: Waveform Annotation
description: The table in this section contains Attributes that identify annotations to the waveform of the current SOP Instance. Each annotation conceptually forms the equivalent of a overlay on a presentation display of the annotated entity. Annotations may represent a measurement or categorization based on the waveform data, identification of regions of interest or particular features of the waveform, or events during the data collection that may affect diagnostic interpretation (e.g., the time at which the subject coughed).

name: Graphic Group
description: Graphic Group Module provides the label and description for the logical associations made by the Graphic Group ID (0070,0295) of graphic objects.

name: Modality LUT
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Modality LUT.

name: VOI LUT
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the VOI LUT.

name: Presentation LUT
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Presentation LUT.

name: Image Histogram
description: Table C.11.5-1. Image Histogram Module Attributes

name: Softcopy Presentation LUT
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Softcopy Presentation LUT.

name: Overlay Activation
description: This Module defines a manner of controlling whether or not bit-mapped overlay and curve information are displayed.

name: Softcopy VOI LUT
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Softcopy VOI LUT. These Attributes have the same meaning and behavior as defined in the Section C.11.2 VOI LUT Module.

name: Presentation Series
description: This module contains Attributes that identify and describe a Presentation Series.

name: Presentation State Identification
description: This module contains Attributes that identify a Presentation State.

name: Presentation State Relationship
description: This module contains Attributes that describe the images to which a Presentation State applies.

name: Presentation State Shutter
description: This module contains Attributes that specialize Attributes in other Modules included in a Presentation State.

name: Presentation State Mask
description: This module contains Attributes that specialize the use of masks in a Presentation State.

name: Presentation State Blending
description: This module contains Attributes that describe the identification of two sets of grayscale images and the grayscale transformations to be applied to them, for the purpose of blending.

name: ICC Profile
description: This module contains Attributes that identify and describe an ICC Profile.

name: Structured Display
description: This module describes the Attributes of the Structured Display Module.

name: Structured Display Image Box
description: This module describes the Attributes of the Structured Display Image Box Module.

name: Structured Display Annotation
description: This Module defines Attributes of text annotation that shall be applied to a Structured Display. The text is defined in position and size relative to the Display Environment.

name: XA/XRF Presentation State Mask
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe mask operations for a XA/XRF Multi-frame image.

name: XA/XRF Presentation State Shutter
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe shutter operations for a XA/XRF Multi-frame image.

name: XA/XRF Presentation State Presentation
description: This module specifies the Attributes of a XA/XRF Presentation State Presentation Module.

name: Volumetric Presentation State Identification
description: This module contains Attributes that describe the volume view type of this Presentation State.

name: Volumetric Presentation State Relationship
description: This module contains Attributes that describe sets of inputs to a Presentation State and how each input is to be displayed in the presentation.

name: Volume Cropping
description: This module contains the Attributes of the Volume Cropping Module. This Module limits the spatial extent of inputs in Volumetric Presentation State Input Sequence (0070,1201) that are used.

name: Presentation View Description
description: This module contains Attributes that describe the view of this presentation in anatomical terms.

name: Multi-Planar Reconstruction Geometry
description: This module contains Attributes that describe the geometry of this Multi-Planar Reconstruction view.

name: MPR Volumetric Presentation State Display
description: This module specifies the Attributes that define the transformations of the processed MPR Volumetric Presentation State inputs into a single VPS display space, as described in the Volumetric Presentation State pipeline in Section FF.2.1 “Volumetric Transformations” in PS3.4.

name: Volumetric Graphic Annotation
description: This module contains Attributes that specify graphic annotation placed in the Volumetric Presentation State Reference Coordinate System coordinate space.

name: Presentation Animation
description: This module contains Attributes that describe animation of the presentation.

name: Volume Render Geometry
description: This module contains Attributes that describe the geometry of the volume rendered view.

name: Render Shading
description: Shading enhances the visual perception of a volume by adding reflection characteristics.

name: Render Display
description: This module specifies the Attributes that define the transformations of the processed Volumetric Presentation State inputs into a single VPS display space, as described in the Volumetric Presentation State pipelines in Section FF.2.2 “Volumetric Inputs, Registration and Cropping” in PS3.4.

name: Advanced Blending Presentation State
description: This module contains Attributes that describe one or more inputs optionally one or more sets of registration objects, and the color and thresholds to be applied to them, for the purpose of blending.

name: Advanced Blending Presentation State Display
description: The Advanced Blending Presentation State Display Module specifies the input and the method used for each blending step.

name: SOP Common
description: This module defines the Attributes that are required for proper functioning and identification of the associated SOP Instances. They do not specify any semantics about the Real-World Object represented by the IOD.

name: Common Instance Reference
description: This module defines the Attributes that describe the hierarchical relationships of any SOP Instances referenced from other Modules within the Instance in which this Module occurs.

name: Frame Extraction
description: This module defines the Attributes that describe the frames extracted if the SOP Instance was created in response to a Frame-Level retrieve request.

name: General Reference
description: This module specifies the Attributes that reference source and other related Instances and describe the manner of derivation.

name: Timezone
description: This module defines the Attributes that are required for proper functioning and identification of the timezone within which an Instance was created.

name: Basic Film Session Presentation
description: Table C.13-1. Basic Film Session Presentation Module Attributes

name: Basic Film Session Relationship
description: Table C.13-2. Basic Film Session Relationship Module Attributes

name: Basic Film Box Presentation
description: Table C.13-3. Basic Film Box Presentation Module Attributes

name: Basic Film Box Relationship
description: Table C.13-4. Basic Film Box Relationship Module Attributes

name: Image Box Pixel Presentation
description: Table C.13-5. Image Box Pixel Presentation Module Attributes

name: Basic Annotation Presentation
description: Table C.13-7. Basic Annotation Presentation Module Attributes

name: Print Job
description: Table C.13-8. Print Job Module Attributes

name: Printer
description: Table C.13-9. Printer Module Attributes

name: Printer Configuration
description: This Module describes Printer Configuration Information.

name: Storage Commitment
description: This module defines the Attributes for referencing SOP Instances that are contained in a Storage Commitment Request/Response.

name: SR Document Series
description: This module defines the Attributes of the SR Document Series. A Series of SR Documents may contain any number of SR Documents.

name: SR Document General
description: This module defines the general Attributes of an SR Document Instance. These Attributes identify the SR Document and provide context for the entire document.

name: SR Document Content
description: This section specifies the Attributes contained in the This module . The Attributes in this Module convey the content of an SR Document.

name: Key Object Document Series
description: This module defines the Attributes of the Key Object Document Series.

name: Key Object Document
description: This module defines the general Attributes of a Key Object Selection Document. These Attributes identify and provide context for the Key Object Selection Document.

name: Raw Data
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe a raw data stream.

name: Spatial Registration Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Spatial Registration Series Module.

name: Spatial Registration
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Spatial Registration Module.

name: Deformable Spatial Registration
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Deformable Spatial Registration Module.

name: Spatial Fiducials Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Spatial Fiducials Series Module.

name: Spatial Fiducials
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Registration.

name: Media Creation Management
description: Table C.22.1-1. Media Creation Management Module Attributes

name: Hanging Protocol Definition
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify the high level definition of a Hanging Protocol, including its overall purpose, and the types of image sets to which it applies. See Annex V “Hanging Protocols (Informative)” in PS3.17 for further explanation.

name: Hanging Protocol Environment
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify the best suited display environment for a Hanging Protocol.

name: Hanging Protocol Display
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe operations (filter, reformat, sort, presentation intent), layout and interactions for a Hanging Protocol. See Annex V “Hanging Protocols (Informative)” in PS3.17 for further explanation.

name: Encapsulated Document Series
description: This module defines the Encapsulated Document Series Attributes.

name: Encapsulated Document
description: This module defines the Encapsulated Document Attributes.

name: Real World Value Mapping Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Real World Value Mapping Series Module.

name: Real World Value Mapping
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Real World Value Mapping Module.

name: Product Characteristics
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the characteristics or parameters of a contrast agent, drug, or device.

name: Substance Approval
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to approve the administration of a contrast agent, drug, or device to a patient.

name: Substance Administration
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to describe the act of administration of a contrast agent, drug, or device to a patient.

name: Substance Administration Log
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to record the act of administration of a contrast agent, drug, or device to a patient.

name: Surface Mesh
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Surface Mesh Module.

name: Point Cloud
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Point Cloud Module.

name: UV Mapping
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the UV Mapping Module.

name: Color Palette Definition
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify a Color Palette.

name: Generic Implant Template Description
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template Description Module.

name: Generic Implant Template 2D Drawings
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template 2D Drawings Module. This Module contains all Attributes required for the inclusion of technical 2D drawings in an IOD, e.g., the Implant Template IOD. The Module specification contains the definition of a subset of the HPGL plotter language that is used for the graphical definition of the drawings.

name: Generic Implant Template 3D Models
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template 3D Models Module. This Module contains Attributes that add context and scaling information to surfaces specified in the Surface Mesh Module, for 3D Models in an Implant Template Instance.

name: Generic Implant Template Mating Features
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template Mating Features Module. This Module adds coordinate systems that can be utilized to geometrically constrain mating of Implant Templates when planning the implantation of a modular implant.

name: Generic Implant Template Planning Landmarks
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template Planning Landmarks Module. This Module adds planning landmarks, i.e., geometric annotations that constrain implant template registration to anatomical features, to the Implant Template IOD.

name: Implant Assembly Template
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Implant Assembly Template Module.

name: Implant Template Group
description: This module contains the Attributes of the Implant Template Group Module.

name: Unified Procedure Step Progress Information
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the progress of a Unified Procedure Step (UPS).

name: Unified Procedure Step Scheduled Procedure Information
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Unified Procedure Step (UPS) to be performed. The UPS may or may not be scheduled for a specific time or device, or may simply represent a piece of work that is intended to be performed.

name: Unified Procedure Step Performed Procedure Information
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the performance and results of a Unified Procedure Step (UPS).

name: Unified Procedure Step Relationship
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the relationship of a Unified Procedure Step (UPS).

name: RT General Machine Verification
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the parameters used in external verification of both conventional radiotherapy (photon or electron) and ion treatment deliveries.

name: RT Conventional Machine Verification
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the parameters used in external verification of a conventional radiotherapy (photon or electron) treatment delivery.

name: RT Ion Machine Verification
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the parameters used in external verification of a radiotherapy ion treatment delivery.

name: Display System
description: This Module describes the Display System.

name: Target Luminance Characteristics
description: This Module is a library of target luminance characteristics to be achieved in the calibration of specific configurations of specific Display Subsystems.

name: QA Results
description: This Module records the latest results of QA activities, such as calibration, performed on the Display Subsystems.

name: Content Assessment Results
description: This Module describes the results of the assessment of a SOP Instance.

name: CT Protocol Series
description: The CT Protocol IODs use the General Series Module described in This module , specialized by the CT Protocol Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of a Protocol.

name: Protocol Context
description: The context in which the described Protocol is defined or performed. This Module is applicable to defined and performed procedure protocols.

name: Patient Protocol Context
description: The patient specific context in which the described Protocol is performed. This Module is applicable to performed procedures.

name: Clinical Trial Context
description: This module contains Attributes that identify a clinical trial context independent of any specific Clinical Trial Subjects.

name: Patient Specification
description: This module contains patient characteristics for which a Protocol may be considered applicable.

name: Equipment Specification
description: This module contains equipment characteristics for which a Protocol may be considered appropriate.

name: Instructions
description: This module contains instructions relating to preparation and performance of the Protocol.

name: Patient Positioning
description: This module contains details about the positioning of the patient before and during the imaging procedure.

name: Defined CT Acquisition
description: This module contains a specification of acceptable values and ranges of acquisition parameters for an imaging procedure.

name: Performed CT Acquisition
description: This Module contains acquisition parameter values for a performed CT imaging procedure. The purpose of this Module is to record all relevant parameters, not just to record the values that were constrained in the executed Defined Protocol (if any).

name: Defined CT Reconstruction
description: This module contains specification of acceptable values and ranges of reconstruction parameters for an imaging procedure.

name: Performed CT Reconstruction
description: This Module contains reconstruction parameter values for a performed CT imaging procedure.

name: Defined Storage
description: This module contains specification of acceptable values and ranges of storage parameters for an imaging procedure. Storage protocol elements may be used to automatically send the output of particular protocol elements to particular destinations. For example, a lung protocol might send thick images to PACS for reading and thin images to a CAD workstation for detection of nodules; a cardiac protocol might send an image set to a clinical analysis workstation; and a protocol used for pre-operative hip replacement planning might send images to the orthopedics department.

name: Performed Storage
description: This Module contains storage parameter values for a performed imaging procedure.

name: Protocol Approval
description: The Protocol Approval Module records approvals of the content of one or more SOP Instances containing protocols by a person or device.

name: Manufacturing 3D Model
description: This module defines Attributes specific to models used in medical 3D manufacturing.

name: Enhanced RT Series
description: The RT Second Generation IODs use the General Series Module described in This module , specialized by the Enhanced RT Series Module.

name: Radiotherapy Common Instance
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information in RT Second Generation IODs.

name: RT Physician Intent
description: The RT Physician Intent Module contains information about the overall intent of the treatment. The content is mostly descriptive text and allows for the presence of unstructured advice by the physician along the established nomenclature of the actual institution.

name: RT Enhanced Prescription
description: The RT Enhanced Prescription Module describes the delivery objectives and labels for intended treatment for a specific target, as defined by the physician.

name: RT Treatment Phase Intent
description: RT Treatment Phases define the intended phases of treatment and their temporal relationship.

name: RT Segment Annotation
description: The RT Segment Annotation Module references segments and provides radiotherapy-specific annotations for them. The geometry of each segment is defined by a referenced Segmentation, Surface Segmentation, RT Structure Set or any other general-purpose Instance that represents geometric information.

name: Segment Reference
description: The Segment Reference Module references geometrical representations, such as regions of interest, surfaces, lines, or points, which have been associated with a Conceptual Volume.

name: RT Radiation Set
description: The RT Radiation Set Module describes treatment fractions that contain a set of beams or brachytherapy setups used within a treatment session to help achieve the dosimetric requirements of a given Treatment Phase. The Module references a set of RT Radiation Instances that describe the geometric and physical parameters that define the delivery of dose for a single fraction. In addition, the overall number of treatment fractions is defined, as well as possibly the fractionation scheme according to which, fractions will be delivered.

name: RT Dose Contribution
description: The RT Dose Contribution Module contains information about the contribution of dose of the RT Radiations referenced by this RT Radiation Set IOD. Dose contributions refer to the RT Radiations delivering the dose and to anatomical structures receiving the dose.

name: RT Delivery Device Common
description: The RT Delivery Device Common Module contains general information pertaining to the physical device used to deliver the treatment.

name: RT Radiation Common
description: The RT Radiation Common Module contains the Attributes shared by all RT Radiation IODs used for radiation treatment delivery.

name: C-Arm Photon-Electron Delivery Device
description: The C-Arm Photon-Electron Delivery Device Module contains C-Arm-specific parameters pertaining to the physical device. These parameters are used to specify or record photon and electron treatments, including geometrical parameters of the collimation system.

name: C-Arm Photon-Electron Beam
description: The C-Arm Photon-Electron Beam Module specifies how a C-Arm photon or electron treatment beam is to be delivered.

name: Tomotherapeutic Delivery Device
description: The Tomotherapeutic Delivery Device Module contains tomotherapy-specific information pertaining to the physical device. These parameters are used to specify or record the treatment, including geometrical parameters of the collimation system.

name: Tomotherapeutic Beam
description: The Tomotherapeutic Beam Module specifies or records how a tomotherapeutic treatment is to be or was delivered.

name: Robotic-Arm Delivery Device
description: The Robotic-Arm Delivery Device Module contains robot-specific information pertaining to the physical device. These parameters are used to specify or record the treatment, including geometric parameters of the collimation system.

name: Robotic-Arm Path
description: The Robotic-Arm Path Module specifies or records how a Robotic Path treatment is to be delivered. Multiple paths are encoded as separate RT Radiation Instances referred to in the RT Radiation Set IOD.

name: File-Set Identification
description: Table F.3-2. File-Set Identification Module Attributes

name: Directory Information
description: This Module contains a Sequence of Directory Records forming one or more Directory Entities. This Module defines at least one Directory Entity, the Root Directory Entity (which may be empty). Each Directory Record is composed of Directory Elements (marked by a ">"). They include:
